TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed DashStyle extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Specifies the style of dashed lines drawn with a object.

remarks.format:
## Remarks To define a custom <xref:System.Drawing.Pen.DashStyle%2A>, set the <xref:System.Drawing.Pen.DashPattern%2A> property of the <xref:System.Drawing.Pen>.
## Examples The following code example demonstrates how to create a pen and set its <xref:System.Drawing.Pen.DashStyle%2A> property using the DashStyle enumeration.
This example is designed to be used with Windows Forms. Create a form that contains a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button> named `Button3`. Paste the code into the form and associate the `Button3_Click` method with the button's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click> event.
[!code-cs[System.Drawing.ImageExample#3](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/t-system.drawing.drawing_6_1.cs)] [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.ImageExample#3](~/add/codesnippet/cpp/t-system.drawing.drawing_6_1.cpp)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.ImageExample#3](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/t-system.drawing.drawing_6_1.vb)]

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Drawing.Drawing2D.DashStyle Custom = int32(5)

Docs.summary: Specifies a user-defined custom dash style.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Drawing.Drawing2D.DashStyle Dash = int32(1)

Docs.summary: Specifies a line consisting of dashes.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Drawing.Drawing2D.DashStyle DashDot = int32(3)

Docs.summary: Specifies a line consisting of a repeating pattern of dash-dot.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Drawing.Drawing2D.DashStyle DashDotDot = int32(4)

Docs.summary: Specifies a line consisting of a repeating pattern of dash-dot-dot.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Drawing.Drawing2D.DashStyle Dot = int32(2)

Docs.summary: Specifies a line consisting of dots.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Drawing.Drawing2D.DashStyle Solid = int32(0)
